synopsis:
The anime special celebrates the 20th anniversary of Gosho Aoyama's original manga, and it recounts a previously untold story from Conan's past.
(Source: ANN)

title.en: The Disappearance of Conan Edogawa: The Worst Two Days in History
title.jp: The Disappearance of Conan Edogawa: The Worst Two Days in History
